creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: small figure at L walking along a trail, carrying 2 buckets on a yoke; rounded, dark land masses at L and R; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'\'VALLEY OF MOUNTAINS\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-3\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375, USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black, on back
title: Valley of the Mountains
